description: The "Cultivating Hope" initiative, led by Fundae, aims to promote regenerative agriculture in the North of Cauca, Colombia. Established during the pandemic, it focuses on empowering local farmers through education and sustainable practices. The project emphasizes agroecological methods, environmental preservation, and community involvement, with over 80 farmers participating. By fostering healthy food production and raising awareness about nutrition, "Cultivating Hope" seeks to improve the well-being of families and combat the challenges of monoculture.
name: GH Demonstrative Farms
